items.summary: Ensure the Internet Identity principal `zq4an-uqz34-isqap-u5moy-4rxll-vz3ff-ndqph-gvmn5-hqe6u-o6j3v-yqe` is granted the `#admin` role in the backend access-control state so this principal can access the admin panel and perform admin-only actions (e.g., create/update products, manage news, upload logo). This must work even when no admins currently exist (i.e., bootstrap an initial admin on install/upgrade if missing).
